Posts.EditableText: TNO would like you to talk to him over MSN or by email.  He seems to be having a problem with the client.  He needs to find out that when Qnet sends the commands to the client, what character is in between the multiple commands that are sent at one time.
Posts.HTML: TNO would like you to talk to him over MSN or by email.  He seems to be having a problem with the client.  He needs to find out that when Qnet sends the commands to the client, what character is in between the multiple commands that are sent at one time.

Posts.EditableText: A carriage return, i.e. vbCRLF, i.e. chr(13)+chr(10)... which I'm sure should have been obvious by looking at the Telnet output.
Posts.HTML: A carriage return, i.e. vbCRLF, i.e. chr(13)+chr(10)... which I'm sure should have been obvious by looking at the Telnet output.
